[[Version 5.5]]

** [[The Chasm: Underground Mines]]

[[Version 5.4]]
* Updated the [[Spiral Abyss]] and [[Imaginarium Theater]] Progress buttons to select the marker instead of only move the map.

* Combined certain reward hints in the top left corner.
* Tracked Custom Markers no longer disappear when zooming in and out.

** [[Aisa Bathhouse]] (Point of Interest) in [[Inazuma City]], [[Narukami Island]], [[Inazuma]].
